context: NATRAVE Measurable Difference Vitamin E Hydrating Body Stress Relief Oil Moisturizing Spa Essential Made in USA . FEATURES : This Vitamin E oil nourishes and protects the skin , leaving it soft and supple . Vitamin E helps protect the appearance of skin damage while effectively replenishing hydration and decreasing the appearance of wrinkles . , SIZE : 4 fl oz , 118 ml , BENEFITS : Some purported benefits of vitamin E oil include moisturizing skin , wound healing , reducing skin itching , eczema , psoriasis , preventing or minimizing the appearance of scars , preventing , or treating fine lines and wrinkles . , USAGE : Vitamin E Oil instant face and body moisturizer . This vitamin E oil nourishes and protects the skin , leaving it soft and supple . Vitamin E helps protect the appearance of skin damage while effectively replenishing hydration and decreasing the appearance of wrinkles . , HOW TO USE : Use daily before moisturizing , start with a single drop and add more as needed . Massage a thin layer over face , neck , and body . Continued use helps to improve skin elasticity and promote healing of the problematic skin .
